About Us
COMMITTED TO EXCELLENCE
St. Mary’s Railway West LLC.(SMW) is a privately owned and operated Class III Short Line Railroad, located in the Heart of South East Georgia, servicing customers from all over the United States and Canada by providing safe storage for idle and/or under-utilized railcars and locomotives.

Our guaranteed 24 – 72 hours or faster delivery time frame, from initial request to delivery of requested railcars to the CSX interchange, plus our ability to provide customized and personalized services are only some of the many advantages, when storing your equipment with us.

While in storage, St. Mary's Railway is able to offer a variety of additional services, e.g, state of the art food grade railcar cleaning (coming soon) and repair services by St. Mary's RRA, Coastal Railcar Services LLC., thus making our facility the perfect one-stop service solution.

St. Mary’s Railway prides itself to provide services with utmost attention to detail to our diversified client base.

The mainline of the ETR runs in a generally southwest direction for some 35 km in a route that roughly parallels the Detroit River that separates Windsor from Detroit, Michigan.

Incorporated in 1902, the ETR provides switching services for local customers engaged in the industrial, lumber, steel, agricultural, scrap metal, alcohol, and liquid petroleum gas (LPG) industry sectors as well as serving our sister company, Morterm Limited with rail access for our Great Lakes transload facility, connecting these customers to CN, CP and CSX.
